io.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.frame.dither

Class FilterLiteDither

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.frame.dither.FilterLiteDither
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DitherHolder, DitheringAlgorithm

    public final class FilterLiteDither
extends java.lang.Object
implements DitherHolder
    The Sierra filters

    In 1989, Frankie Sierra came out with his three-line filter:

    * 5 3 The Sierra3 filter 2 4 5 4 2 2 3 2 (1/32)

    A year later, Sierra followed up with a two-line modification:

    * 4 3 The Sierra2 filter 1 2 3 2 1 (1/16)

    and a very simple "Filter Lite," as he calls it:

    * 2 The Sierra-2-4A filter 1 1 (1/4)

    Even this very simple filter, according to Sierra, produces better results than the original Floyd-Steinberg filter.

    See https://web.archive.org/web/20190316064436/http://www.efg2.com/Lab/Library/ImageProcessing/DHALF.TXT for more information about the studies
